action.member: See how people see your profile

info.title: Mix-IT is also...
info.section1content: Conferences to discover new ideas, games to learn, development or creative workshops. Mix-IT, it's 2 intense days of headway and meets! The party, open to everyone, is also the ideal moment to meet new people and open to other cultures.
info.section2content: In order to keep a friendly atmosphere, the number of attendees is limited to 600 people. We fight to offer you a very affordable price, in order to allow everyone to enjoy the event...

intro.title: The conference in Lyon not to be missed! Two days packed with ideas and amazing people in a friendly atmosphere, dedicated to the diversity of topics, of technologies, and of our attendees.
intro.p1: We have exciting jobs with so many things to learn. We are the Web and software actors of today and tomorrow, we bring ideas, we realize and release them. Are you looking for inspiration, good practices and new tools? You will find those at Mix-IT! Come meet and share with other enthusiasts.
intro.p2: If you missed the previous editions, here is a quick overview:

speaker.title: 2016 speakers aren't known yet, but here is a focus of some we have seen during the previous editions:

sponsor.title: Became sponsor of the 2016 edition
sponsor.annonce: Take the opportunity of this event to promote you company. We offer different partnership levels detailed in the following leaflet. Please fill and send back to us this

conduite.title: Code of conduct
conduite.p1: Principles to follow if you come to Mix-IT
conduite.p2: You have been awesome the previous years, and we hope that this year again the conference will take place without any trouble. Nevertheless, other examples of conference showed that problems can always happen. We thus decided to set a code of conduct and contribute to make our communities a pleasant place for everyone about is their origins, age, sex and sexuality... Enjoy these two days and continue to make Mix-IT the conference we all love. Obviously, these principles are natural for us and they should be applied in this conference as in the everyday life without the need to remind them.

q1.title: How to buy a ticket?
q1.content: The tickets sales usually take place a month before the conference. We announce the event on our website, on our Twitter account and Google+ account accounts

q2.title: What is the schedule of the conference?
q2.content: The conference takes place during 2 days. We welcome you for each day from 08:30 am. Morning sessions begin at 09:30 am. The end of the day is between 6 pm and 06:30 pm.

q3.title: How to get a bill for my Mix-IT ticket?
q3.content: In order to get your bill, you'll have to connect to our partner's ticketing website: yurplan.com. In the 'My tickets' section, you'll find a button allowing you to edit your bill. Please note that this bill does not show any VAT nor amount excluding tax, and this is normal: the conference is organized by an association subdued to the french law 1901. The association does not collect any VAT so we cannot show it on the bills.

q4.title: Is it possible to participate to Mix-IT as a training?
q4.content: This year, our sponsor Viseo will manage this part. This partner will make you sign, everyday and on site, a sign-in sheet and will give you a certificate of training. During the buying of your tickets, a checkbox will allow you to indicate the will to declare it as a training. We invite you to see with our partner for any other related question about this subject.

q5.title: Is it possible to use my 'Compte Personnel de Formation' (CPF) to subscribe to Mix-IT?
q5.content: Mix-IT is not referenced in the 'Compte Personnel de Formation' list. Nevertheless, our partner Viseo will give you on site a certificate of professional training for the event. We invite you to see with our partner for any other related question about this subject.

q6.title: How can I change my profile picture?
q6.content: Avatars are managed by Gravatar. We show the avatar corresponding to the email you set in your profile. You'll have to connect to Gravatar in order to modify your image.

q7.title: Social network
q7.content: We usually communicate through our Twitter account @MixIT_Lyon. If you want to talk about the next edition, please use the #mixit16 hashtag

multimedia.title: Multimedia content
multimedia.content: There are the offical Mix-IT logos. You cannot use these logos as a commercial company without being a registered partner. If your company want to be a registered partner, please consult the page

come.title: How to come to Mix-IT?
come.accroche: We invite you to use public transportation, bikes or walking if you want to come to the conference. Your day will be so much greener!

bike.title: Bike
bike.content: Lyon has a great self-service bike system: Vélo'V. The nearer stations from CPE Lyon are stations 10084 - La Doua / Avenue des Arts (Avenue des Arts, Villeurbanne) and 10102 - DOUA / Gaston Berger (Avenue Gaston Berger, Villeurbanne).

common.title: Public transportation
common.content:
See precise routes on the TCL network website (Tramway, Subway, Bus). The closest tramway station from CPE Lyon is La Doua Gaston-Berger on the lines T1 and T4:
Stop at La Doua Gaston-Berger, turn right on Rue Gaston Berger, pass the building "ASTREE" then take the first left, rue Victor Grignard: CPE is few meters away on your right (about 5 min walking from the tramway, the path will be indicated with signs).

train.title: Train
train.content1: From the Part-Dieu station, take the tramway T1, in the direction of IUT - Feyssine, or tramway T4, in the direction La Doua G. Berger. Stop at La Doua Gaston-Berger (terminus of all the T4).
train.content2: From Perrache station, take the A line of the subway, direction Vaulx-en-Velin la Soie, change at Charpennes station and take the tramway T1, direction IUT - Feyssine, or tramway T4, direction La Doua G. Berger. Stop at La Doua Gaston-Berger (terminus of all the T4).

plane.title: Plane
plane.content1: Saint-Exupéry Airport is the closest airport from Lyon. Thanks to the express lineRhône Express (a train every 15 minutes), you are at 30 minutes from the centre of Lyon, Part-Dieu station.
plane.content2: From the Part-Dieu station, take the tramway T1, in the direction of IUT - Feyssine, or tramway T4, in the direction La Doua G. Berger. Stop at La Doua Gaston-Berger (terminus of all the T4).

car.title: Car
car.content:
Set the following address in your GPS:
Rue Victor Grignard
Villeurbanne

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.p1: It is kind of soon to announce speakers of the 2016 edition but here is the list of people who came to talk on 2015.

staff.title: Mix-IT team

mixit.p1: Mix-IT is a beautiful story began in 2011 and born from the collaboration of the Lyon Java User Group and the Club Agile Rhône-Alpes. 2016 will be the 6th edition already, and one of its first principles "to have an accessible conference to everyone" is always our agenda.
mixit.p2: Even if this conference has been created by Lyon JUG and CARA, you will not hear only about Agile and Java. Our goal is to not only have talks  about the development in the broad sense, but also about management, project, entrepreneurship, desktop development, mobile phone and web...
mixit.p3: Like each year, we are proud to welcome you for some expert sessions, games and meetings. Entrepreneurs, project managers, developers, you will find ideas for your project! Talks are given in French and in English.

staff.benevole: Mix-IT is organised exclusively by volunteers

lightningtalks.title: Lightningtalks
lightningtalks.p1: You can propose 5 minutes talks for the conference. Only the best rated will be selected

talks.title: Talks and workshops
talks.p1: You can suggest 3 different formats: keynotes (at the beginning and the end of the day, in front of everyone), talks, and workshops. For the last one, please follow the instructions in order to know if some prerequisites are mandatory.

error.title: An error has been detected
error.explanation: An error occured. Please try again and if the error is still there, do not hesitate to contact us in order to allow us to correct it

account.linkdesc: You can add 4 links to your profile

update.title: Account
update.description: You can update your personal data
update.markdown: Markdown can be used to format your description

creation.title: Account creation
creation.description: To create an account, we need to know how to contact you. The minimum includes an email to confirm, a login, and your full name. Your email address will never be disclosed to third parties.
creation.descriptionsocial: To create an account, we need to know how to contact you. Your email address will never be disclosed to third parties.
creation.confirmation: Thank you for creating an account on Mix-IT website. We have just sent you an email to confirm your email address. Click the link in the email to validate your account and such be able to use all the features of the website such as managing your favorites ...

login.title: Authentication
login.secure: Some features of the site are secured.
login.cnil: In accordance with the Data Protection Act you have the rights to view and edit your data. You can also ask by request to delete your account.
login.advice: We recommend you to use an authentication provider such as Google + or Twitter so you do not have to remember a password and have it stored on our servers.
login.newaccount3: with a username and a password. The passwords are obviously encrypted and secure.
login.newpassword: If you have lost your password, regenerate it by clicking

passwordlost.title: Lost password
passwordlost.description: If you have lost your password or if your account is not active please enter the email address you used to create your account
passwordlost.explication: You'll receive an email with a link to reset your password
passwordlost.confirmation: We have just sent you an email with a link to reset your password.

passwordreinit.title: Change password
passwordreinit.description: Enter your actual password (if you had asked for a re-initialization, a temporary password has been sent you by email) and the new one...

home.title: Call for paper 2016
home.p1: The sixth Mix-IT edition will be held in Lyon, France on April 21 & 22 2016. Submitions will be accepted until the 6 March 2016.
home.p2: One of our core value is to make the conference accessible to the vast majority. The purpose is to gather everyone around, from managers to developers, even the ones who have to pay by their own because their company or their non-funded startup won’t pay for them. You can propose talks or workshop for beginers to confirmed people, because all those profiles are present at Mix-IT we wish to provide everyone whith sessions they'll love.
home.p3: Some of our speakers are directly invited by the Mix-IT team. If you are one of them we need you to complete your profile and the talks/workshop details to help the attendees the D day.
home.suggestion: If you have no idea on the subject, there's a few suggestion
home.explanation: If you want to increase your chances of success, feel free to submit multiple sessions. The number of submitted sessions is important to help us to build the best program for attendees.

category.help: This field enables you to link your talk to a global theme.

talk.headline: You will perform a session that you worked hard on, a perfectly planned workshop, or a game where participants will have a lot of fun. Please fill this form to make both the CFP commitee and the future audience enjoyed about it! You will only be able to submit the form when all mandatory fields are filed but you can come back as many time as you with to update it.

description.help: You can here describe precisely you session. Please insist on your contents and what you will learn to the audience.

format.help: You need to choose your session type.

ideaForNow.help: Mix-IT motto is ''Ideas for now''. Our purpose is to provide attentees with insights they can use as soon as possible.

interest.help: Interests allows you to define keywords to tag your session with.

language.help: Mix-IT welcomes international speakers, the staff always tries to have at least a track in English so they can fully participate to the conference.

levels.help: Mix-IT gathers beginners to experts, this fiels lets you specify who your andience is, so they don't yet disapointed.

messageForStaff.help: If you ever played this sessions elsewhere you can tell it here, or if you wish to share some constraints about your session (this field is not intended to deal with availablities, nor hotels and parties details). This section will be avaiable to the Mix-IT staff only.

maxAttendees.help: Especially for workshops, you can tell the staff here if you wish to limit the number of attentees. This detail will be made public.

summary.help: This summary will be used on the printed planning. Please try to summarize your session in one or two sentences.

title.help: This is one of the most important part of this form. Title must be catchy and concise.

types.help: Some attendees like to choose the session by the form it will take.

error.INVALID_TOKEN: The authentication is incorrect. Please create an account from the login page
error.EXPIRED_TOKEN: The identification data contained in the link you just clicked are expired. Please reset your password on the login page
error.LOGIN_GOOGLE: An error occurred when we tried to contact Google+. Please try again later or use another provider for authentication
error.LOGIN_TWITTER: An error occurred when we tried to contact Twitter. Please try again later or use another provider for authentication
error.EMAIL_ALREADY_USED: This email is already used. If it is yours, click the link to reset your password on the login page
error.UNDEFINED: Error detected. Please try again or contact the Mix-IT team to have this bug reported
error.ACCOUNT_NOT_VALID: You must validate your account before performing this action. Check your inbox and click the link in the email we sent you and which is entitled Account Validation
error.REQUIRED_ARGS: The login and password are required
error.USER_NOT_FOUND: This login does not exist. Please register to login
error.EMAIL_NOT_EXIST: This email does not match any registered account
error.VALID_PASSWORD: The password confirmation does not match the entered password
error.MIN_LENGTH: The password must be at least 8 characters
error.CONNEXION_REFUSED: The remote host is not available for the moment. Please try again later...
error.NEED_VALIDATION: You received an email to valid your account. If you don't have this email, ask a password reinitilization.
error.CONFIRM_EXIT_FROM_CREATION_ACCOUNT: You need to fill in a valid email address. Without email you won't be able to access to the secured pages.

whoarewe.title: Who are we?
whoarewe.content: Mix-IT is a non profit association created in 2011 by volunteers coming from technological and agile user groups in Lyon
